charges.charge_disposition: CBOP 120 MONTHS ON EACH COUNT, CONCURRENTLY. 5 Years Supervised release with special &; standard conditions. Dft shall submit his person to search by a probation officer in a reasonable manner and at reasonable times. $200.00 Special Assessment. (1)
